str2: If. From ei and an; a conditional particle; in case that, provided, etc.

parse: Verb - Present Subjunctive Active - 2nd Person Plural
str2: To love, wish well to, take pleasure in, long for; denotes the love of reason, esteem. Perhaps from agan; to love.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Accusative 1st Person Singular
str2: I, the first-person pronoun. A primary pronoun of the first person I.

parse: Verb - Future Indicative Active - 2nd Person Plural
str2: From teros; to guard, i.e. To note; by implication, to detain; by extension, to withhold; by extension, to withhold.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Accusative Feminine 1st Person Plural
str2: My, mine. From the oblique cases of ego; my.
An ordinance, injunction, command, law. From entellomai; injunction, i.e. An authoritative prescription.
